text: Effective date: June 09, 2022
label: Policy Change

text: Public comment (hereinafter or "we") pays great attention to protecting the personal information and privacy of users ("you"). We know the importance of personal information to you, and will take the laws and regulations and the industry's mature security standards.Corresponding security measures to protect your personal information.
We hope to clearly introduce you how to deal with your personal information and protect you when using our products/services through this privacy policy.
This policy will help you understand the following:
1. How do we collect and use your personal information
2. How do we use cookies and similar technologies
3. How can we share, transfer, and publicly disclose your personal information
4. How do we save and protect your personal information
5. How do you manage your personal information
6. Protection of personal information of minors
7. Notification and revision
8. How to contact us
9. Appendix
[Special Tips] Please read and fully understand this "Privacy Policy" (the key content has bolded the fonts, please pay special attention to the use of the products/services we provided by us.
Once you use or continue to use our products/services, it means that you agree that we will process your relevant information in accordance with this privacy policy.
label: Policy Change
Important
Risk
rewrite: Once you use or continue to use our products/services, it means that you agree to be subject to this policy.

text: If you have any questions about this privacy policy, you can contact us through the way how to contact us in this privacy policy).

The product/service of the public comment is the product/service provided by the Shanghai Hantao Information Consulting Co., Ltd. (Registration Address: Room 149, Hangzhou Road, No. 741, Hangzhou Road, Yangpu District, Shanghai) and its related parties provided to you through the following channels:Including but not limited to client clients such as the public review website (www.dianping.com), the public review app, and the related WeChat open platform account account or applet.
label: Contact Information

text: For certain specific products/services, we will also formulate a separate privacy policy to explain the special policies of these products/services.
If the relevant privacy policy is inconsistent with the privacy policy, the specific privacy policy is applicable.

The popular reviews and related parties referred to in this policy refer to the single name or collective name of Shanghai Hantao Information Consulting Co., Ltd., Hanhai Information Technology (Shanghai) Co., Ltd. and the existing and/or future related related related companies.

Please note that this policy is not applicable to other third -party products/services connected by your products/services ("Other third parties", including your trading counterparty, any third -party website, and third -party service providerWait), please refer to the privacy policy or similar statement of the third party.
1. How do we collect and use your personal information
When you use our products/services, you need/you can choose to authorize us to collect and use personal information.

1. In order to provide you with the basic functions of our product/service, you need to authorize us to collect and use the necessary information. If you refuse to provide the aforementioned necessary information, you will not be able to use our product/service normally;

First Party Collection Information
rewrite: In order to provide you with the basic functions of our products/services, you need to authorize us to collect and use the necessary information.

text: 2. In order to provide you with the expansion function of our product/service, you can choose to authorize us to collect and use information. If you refuse to provide the aforementioned information, you will not be able to use related additional functions normally or to achieve the functional effects we intend to achieve, But it does not affect your basic functions of using our products/services normally.
label: Important
First Party Collection Information
rewrite: In order to provide you with the expansion function of our product/service, you can choose to authorize us to collect and use information.

text: (1) You need to authorize us to collect and use personal information.
We will follow the principles of legitimate, legal, and necessary, and use your personal information for the following purposes described in this policy.

First Party Collection Information

text: 2. Provide you with geographic location -based information display

In order to provide you with the display and search service of the surrounding food, drinking, and travel information, and improve our service performance, efficiency and functions, we authorize us to collect relevant information you generate in the process of using our service, including:

First Party Collection Information

text: (1) Location information.

When you authorize the positioning function of the mobile device with the system and use the service -based services, we will collect and use your location information to recommend the surrounding life services (for example, you do not need to enter the geographical location where you can enterRelated services, estimated the actual distance between the merchant and you facilitates you to make consumer decisions, recommend the service category and preferential information of nearby for you).

First Party Collection Information

text: (2) Log information.

When you use the products/services we provide, we will collect information from browsing, searching, clicking, collecting, collecting, trading, after -sales, attention, sharing, release and other information as related online logs, including you, including youThe IP address, the type of browser, the language used, the version of the operating system, the date and time of access, the telecommunications operator, and the network request.

First Party Collection Information

When you use our product/service process, we may collect your sensor information to adapt your device status or identify your actions when you choose to participate in the event.It will be used in specific scenarios.

First Party Collection Information

text: 12. Provide you with security guarantee

In order to ensure your account security, transaction security, and system operation security, to meet the requirements of laws and regulations and our agreement rules, in the process of accessing and using our products/service, you will obtain your device information, network information, network information, network information, network information, networkStatus information, including the device model, hardware serial number, device MAC address, unique device recognition code (such as IMEI/Android/IDFA/Openudid/Guid/OAID, SIM card IMSI, ICCID information and other device identifiers),Software characteristics such as mobile application list, WIFI status, telecommunications operator and other software.

First Party Collection Information
Data Security

text: Without your authorization, we will not obtain the above information in advance.

In order to improve the security of the services you provide, and to prevent fraud and Trojan virus more accurately, we may use or integrate your personal information, as well as our related parties and partners to obtain information you authorize or shared according to law.Based on your habits and common software information, you can comprehensively judge your account number and transaction risk, including verifying your identity, preventing, discovering, and investigating possible security risks such as fraud, network virus, and cyber attacks that violate us or related party agreements,Policies or rules to protect the legitimate rights and interests of you, other users, or we or related parties, and record some links ("url") that we think are risky.
label: Important
First Party Collection Information
Data Security

text: If you find your personal information disclosure, especially your account or password, please contact us according to the contact information provided in this privacy policy in order to take corresponding measures.

Data Security

text: 4. Safety events

After unfortunately a personal information security incident, we will immediately set up a special emergency team to start emergency plans to prevent the expansion of security events, and inform you in a timely manner in accordance with the requirements of laws and regulations: the basic situation and possible impact of the security incident, we have adopted the adoptionIt may take disposal measures, suggestions that you can prevent and reduce risks, and remedy measures for your remedy.
label: Important
Data Security
rewrite: If a personal information security incident occurs, we will inform your basic situation, possible impact, disposal measures, independent prevention suggestions, etc.

text: We will promptly inform you that the incident -related situation is informing the email, letter, telephone, push notification, etc. When it is difficult to inform the subject of personal information one by one, we will publish an announcement in a reasonable and effective way.
label: Important
Data Security
rewrite: The relevant situation of security incidents will be informed by mail, letter, telephone, push notification, etc. When it is difficult to inform one by one, it will issue an announcement.

text: At the same time, we will also actively report to the disposal of personal information security incidents in accordance with the requirements of the regulatory authorities.
label: Important
Data Security
rewrite: Report the disposal of personal information security incidents in accordance with the requirements of the regulatory authorities.

Public comment attaches great importance to the protection of personal information of minors.
Our websites and services are mainly adults.

text: appendix:
1. Personal information: Various information related to recognized or recognized natural persons recorded in electronics or other methods, excluding information after anonymous processing.
Personal information that may involve in this privacy policy includes, but not limited to: personal information (including name, phone number, gender, address, birthday, birthday, etc.);
Personal identity information (including ID cards, officers, passports, driving licenses, etc.);
Network identity identification information (including system accounts, IP addresses, mailbox addresses, and the answer to the aforementioned password, password, password protection);
Personal property information (including bank accounts, transactions and consumption records, credit records, and virtual property information, etc.);
Personal health and physiological information (including diseases, medical records, history, etc.);
Contact information (including address book information, friends list, etc.);
Personal Internet records (including website browsing records, click records, etc.);
Personal device information (including information that describes the basic situation of individual equipment such as the unique device identification code);
Personal location information (including the trajectory, precise positioning information, accommodation information, etc.).

2. Sensitive personal information: It refers to personal information that can easily cause the personality and dignity of natural people to be violated or harmed by personal and property security once leaked or illegally used.

Personal sensitive information that may be involved in this privacy policy includes: personal identity certification information (including ID cards, officers, passports, driving licenses, student IDs, etc.);
Personal property information (bank account, transaction and consumption records, credit records, virtual property information, etc.);
Other information (whereabouts, address book information, accommodation information, accurate positioning information, medical health information, biometric information, etc.);
Under 14 years old, minor information.

3. Meituan: The "Meituan" referred to in this policy refers to all companies under Meituan and its affiliated companies (including Meituan.com, Public Comment, Mobike and other platforms that have established companies and the future.Established).

Popular comment: Refers to the life service information platform under the Meituan of Shanghai Hantao Information Consulting Co., Ltd., including but not limited to the popular Internet platforms such as Public Comment Network, Public Comment Client, and Public Comment Mini Program.
4. Related company: refers to Meituan related companies disclosed by Meituan's latest listed company annual report.
